thread.title: Life | This boy wants to be Elsa from 'Frozen' for Halloween and his dad had the best response ever
thread.title_full: Life | This boy wants to be Elsa from 'Frozen' for Halloween and his dad had the best response ever - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Life | This boy wants to be Elsa from 'Frozen' for Halloween and his dad had the best response ever
text:
It may have come out forever ago but 'Frozen' fever is still well and truly alive in kids of today, and in one little boy in particular who's got his Halloween outfit all planned - for him and his father.
Paul Henson uploaded this photo of his son Caiden to Facebook on Sunday after Caiden revealed his Halloween costume choice which is enough cause for a liking spree alone.
But it's what Paul said in the caption that's really got people liking and sharing like there's no tomorrow.
"Anyone that knows us, knows we generally let Caiden make his own choices, to an extent. Well, he has decided on a Halloween costume. He wants to be Elsa. He also wants me to be Anna. Game on." he wrote.
"Keep your masculine bullshit and slutty kids costumes, Halloween is about children pretending to be their favorite characters. Just so happens, this week his is a princess."
Anyone that knows us, knows we generally let Caiden make his own choices, to an extent. Well, he has decided on a...
Posted by Paul Henson on Sunday, October 4, 2015 Now we just have to wait for his costume reveal. Halloween can't come quick enough.
Via Facebook
